gh.asteroids1

Class SoundHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gh.asteroids1.SoundHandler

  • public class SoundHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utilities for instantiating and using sound clips.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundHandler()
      Default constructor - no args.
      SoundHandler(java.lang.String filename)
      Constructs a SoundHandler with supplied sound file.

        public boolean getLooping()
        Accessor method for the looping status of the clip.
        Returns:
        whether the clip plays continuously

      • setLooping

        public void setLooping(boolean loop)
        Mutator method for the looping status.
        Parameters:
        loop - to loop or not to loop

      • getRepeat

        public int getRepeat()
        Accessor method for the repeat property.
        Returns:
        the number of times the sound will repeat

      • setRepeat

        public void setRepeat(int times)
        Mutator method for the repeat property
        Parameters:
        times - the number of times to repeat the sound; the repeats are over and above the first play of the sound - setting repeat to 1 will play the sound twice.

      • getFilename
